H0.text: A medium planet with an atmosphere is at the center of our solar system.

H1.text: A star composed of carbon and nitrogen is at the center of our solar system.

H2.text: A black hole that was once a star is at the center of our solar system.

H3.text: A star composed of hydrogen and helium is at the center of our solar system.

A4.text: The Sun is the star at the centre of the Solar System.

A5.text: The Sun is a G-type main-sequence star (G2V), informally called a yellow dwarf, though its light is actually white.
